title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ResourcePolicyDailyCycle
name: ResourcePolicyDailyCycle
description:
Time window specified for daily operations.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ResourcePolicyDailyCycle

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.days_in_cycle
params.description: Defines a schedule with units measured in days. The value determines how many days pass between the start of each cycle.

params.name: data.duration
params.description: [Output only] A predetermined duration for the window, automatically chosen to be the smallest possible in the given scenario.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Start time of the window. This must be in UTC format that resolves to one of 00:00, 04:00, 08:00, 12:00, 16:00, or 20:00. For example, both 13:00-5 and 08:00 are valid.
